title: Identify the Purpose of Pie Charts
text: Pie charts are used to represent parts of a whole based on how much data is in each category.

title: Focus on Proportions
text: Pie charts are effective for showing proportions between different categories visually, but it is difficult to show exact values.

title: Not for Trends
text: A line chart is more suitable for visualizing and analyzing change in chronological data trends over time, since a pie chart only takes the count of each section as a proportion of the whole.

title: Not for Correlations
text: Pie charts are not suitable for showing correlations between variables because multiple categories are often included.
